titles.title: Supplementary data for 'Chapter 2: More than a trace of oxygen: Ichnological constraints on the formation of the giant Zn-Pb-Ag ± Ba deposits, Red Dog district, Alaska'

descriptions.description: Supplementary file associated with PhD thesis Chapter 2 - More than a trace of oxygen: Ichnological constraints on the formation of the giant Zn-Pb-Ag ± Ba deposits, Red Dog district, Alaska. This includes six figures and one data table. Figure DR1: Regional geology of the Red Dog District. Figure DR2: Stratigraphic columns for the Kuna Formation. Figure DR3-DR4: Additional Red Dog traces. Figure DR5-DR6: Typical traces from non-hydrothermally altered sedimentary rocks compared with Red Dog traces. Table DR1: Sample locations. This file can also be found in the GSA Data Repository (item 2015292). It is available online at www.geosociety.org/pubs/ft2015.htm, or on request from editing@geosociety.org or Documents Secretary, GSA, P.O. Box 9140, Boulder, CO 80301, USA.
